Explanation: A topological space that resembles euclidean space near each point. It can be coordinatized by Rn through a family of homeomorphisms.
Also called Levi-Civita connection, it is dependent on the metric $g$. It gives us information about how to transport vectors along a curve, while conserving the metric.
